languages.text: "Воистину Ваша Светлость знает, как извлекать выгоду и заводить друзей. Уверен, Пустотное братство только обрадуется, узнав, что теперь вы — хозя{mf|ин|йка} станции".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} truly knows how to make friends and maximise profits. I am sure the Fellowship of the Void will be delighted to know that you are the new {mf|master|mistress} of the station."
languages.original_text: "Воистину Ваша Светлость знает, как извлекать выгоду и заводить друзей. Уверен, Пустотное братство только обрадуется, узнав, что теперь вы — хозя{mf|ин|йка} станции".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} truly knows how to make friends and maximise profits. I am sure the Fellowship of the Void will be delighted to know that you are the new {mf|master|mistress} of the station."

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wissen wirklich, wie man Freunde gewinnt und den Profit maximiert. Ich bin sicher, die Gefährten der Leere werden überaus erfreut sein, wenn sie erfahren, dass Ihr {mf|der neue Herr|die neue Herrin} der Station seid."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} truly knows how to make friends and maximise profits. I am sure the Fellowship of the Void will be delighted to know that you are the new {mf|master|mistress} of the station."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wissen wirklich, wie man Freunde gewinnt und den Profit maximiert. Ich bin sicher, die Gefährten der Leere werden überaus erfreut sein, wenn sie erfahren, dass Ihr {mf|der neue Herr|die neue Herrin} der Station seid."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie sait mieux que personne comment se faire des amis et optimiser ses profits. Je parie que la Communauté du vide sera ravie d'apprendre que vous êtes {mf|le nouveau maître|la nouvelle maîtresse} de la station. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} truly knows how to make friends and maximise profits. I am sure the Fellowship of the Void will be delighted to know that you are the new {mf|master|mistress} of the station."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie sait mieux que personne comment se faire des amis et optimiser ses profits. Je parie que la Communauté du vide sera ravie d'apprendre que vous êtes {mf|le nouveau maître|la nouvelle maîtresse} de la station. »

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady} sabe bien cómo hacer amigos y maximizar los beneficios. No me cabe duda de que la Hermandad del Vacío estará encantada de saber que es usted {mf|el nuevo señor|la nueva señora} de la estación».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} truly knows how to make friends and maximise profits. I am sure the Fellowship of the Void will be delighted to know that you are the new {mf|master|mistress} of the station."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady} sabe bien cómo hacer amigos y maximizar los beneficios. No me cabe duda de que la Hermandad del Vacío estará encantada de saber que es usted {mf|el nuevo señor|la nueva señora} de la estación».

languages.text: 「陛下はどうやって味方を作り、利益を最大化するのかをご存じですね。あなたがこのステーションの主となったことを知れば『虚空の仲間』は喜ぶことでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} truly knows how to make friends and maximise profits. I am sure the Fellowship of the Void will be delighted to know that you are the new {mf|master|mistress} of the station."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下はどうやって味方を作り、利益を最大化するのかをご存じですね。あなたがこのステーションの主となったことを知れば『虚空の仲間』は喜ぶことでしょう」

languages.text: “您确实很了解如何交朋友，同时保障最大程度的利益，大人。我相信，若是虚空协联得知您成为了这座星站的新主人，他们一定会非常高兴。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} truly knows how to make friends and maximise profits. I am sure the Fellowship of the Void will be delighted to know that you are the new {mf|master|mistress} of the station."

traits.locale_text: “您确实很了解如何交朋友，同时保障最大程度的利益，大人。我相信，若是虚空协联得知您成为了这座星站的新主人，他们一定会非常高兴。”

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, hem arkadaş edinmeyi hem de azami kâr elde etmeyi iyi biliyor. İstasyonun yeni {mf|efendisi|hanımı} olduğunuzu duymak, eminim ki Uçsuz Kardeşliği'nin çok hoşuna gidecektir."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} truly knows how to make friends and maximise profits. I am sure the Fellowship of the Void will be delighted to know that you are the new {mf|master|mistress} of the station."
